app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Private Record Master
app_description: Recording has never been easier! A modern contemporary design that makes it easy to record and share personal notes family moments class lectures work meetings presentations and interviews. In addition it can help you learn foreign languages easily. Easy to record: Background recording automatic recording multiple format selection custom recording plan how to record how to record. Listen to it: Create your own playlist customize the play mode play time and playback speed and listen to what you want to hear. Good to share: A variety of sharing methods easy to share with family and friends. Support social media share mail iCloud Wi Fi file sharing iTunes file sharing etc. Keep track of your life record your life anytime anywhere!
